com.kamontat.factory

Class UpdaterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kamontat.factory.UpdaterFactory

  • public class UpdaterFactory
extends Object
    Factory for Updatable, easy and to use but hard to manage
    This is optional, you might use directly

    Explanation: this class is singleton for sure, so you can install updatable class only once times. And next time to get update you can call method getFactory() instead

    Since:
    Tue 21/Mar/2017 - 9:21 AM
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    kamontat

      in case you need to implement loading action by yourself

public String download(@Nullable
                                   Runnable action)
                            throws UpdateException,
                                   IOException
        download file to setting location DownloadFactory.createDownloadable(URL, String)
        Parameters:
        action - action code will do while loading, time by time
        Returns:
        location/path that actually place

        Precondition: should call checkRelease() first
        check is latest version
        Returns:

      • getURLReader

        public URLReader getURLReader()
        in case you need to implement loading action by yourself
        Allow method:
        1. URLReader.getTotalByte() - For getting total byte to loaded
        2. URLReader.getBytesRead() - For getting current byte are already loaded
        3. URLReader.getOutputFile() - For getting location that file will placed
        if use other method may cause unexpected result.
        Returns:
        reader

      • delete

        public void delete()
        dangerous method
        This might cause all file is gone, so use when you sure that new file downloaded.
